title: What's the ruling on a person who misses Friday prayer? - Assim al hakeem
transcript: missing Juma on Friday for men what is the ruling the Prophet said alehissalaam whoever misses Friday for three consecutive Friday's so in a row then Allah would put a seal on his heart and this is a serious warning if there is no legitimate reason and you just simply skip it I was asleep following German I was at the beach third German we had to work out in the gym or with the team then Allah would seal a person's heart
